detaileddescription.para: Connectable undirected advertising. Peer devices can scan and connect to this device.
Connectable directed advertising, high duty cycle. Only a specified peer device can connect to this device.
Scannable undirected advertising. Peer devices can scan this device but cannot connect.
Non-connectable undirected advertising. Peer devices cannot scan or connect to this device.
Connectable directed advertising, low duty cycle. Only a specified peer device can connect to this device.

briefdescription.para: The advertising type indicates the connectable and discoverable nature of the advertising packets transmitted by a device.

detaileddescription.para: Scan from any device.
Scan from White List only.
Connect from While List only.
Scan and connect from While List only.
Connectable advertising.
Scannable advertising.
Directed advertising.
High Duty Cycle advertising.
Use legacy advertising PDUs.
Omit advertiser's address from all PDUs (anonymous advertising).
Include TxPower in the advertising PDU.
Use decision PDUs when advertising.
Include AdvA in the extended header of all decision PDUs.
Include ADI in the extended header of all decision PDUs.
Intermediate fragment.
First fragment.
Last fragment.
Complete extended advertising data.
Unchanged data (just update the Advertising DID).
Controller may fragment all Host advertising data.
Controller should not fragment nor minimize fragmentation of Host advertising data.

advTxPwr
Advertising transmit power level.
Set the advertising transmit power.

pAdvTxPwr
Advertising transmit power level.
Status error code.
Return the advertising transmit power.

advIntervalMin

advIntervalMax

advType

ownAddrType

peerAddrType
Address type of peer device. Only used for directed advertising.
pPeerAddr
Address of peer device. Only used for directed advertising.
advChanMap
Advertising channel map.
advFiltPolicy
Advertising filter policy.
Status error code.
Set advertising parameters.

Set to true to enable advertising, false to disable advertising.
Enable or disable advertising.

briefdescription.para: Set extended advertising transmit PHY options.

handle
Advertising handle.
priPhyOpts
Primary advertising channel PHY options.
secPhyOpts
Secondary advertising channel PHY options.

PHY options for extended advertising transmissions. New values are applied dynamically.

pMinTxPwr
Return buffer for minimum transmit power.
pMaxTxPwr
Return buffer for maximum transmit power.
Read the minimum and maximum transmit powers supported by the LL.

pTxPathComp
Return buffer for RF transmit path compensation value.
pRxPathComp
Return buffer for RF receive path compensation value.
Read the RF Path Compensation Values parameter used in the Tx Power Level and RSSI calculation.

txPathComp
RF transmit path compensation value.
rxPathComp
RF receive path compensation value.
Status error code.
Indicate the RF path gain or loss between the RF transceiver and the antenna contributed by intermediate components.

enable
Set to true to enable scan reports, false to disable scan reports.
Enable or disable reports about the scanners from which an advertiser receives scan requests.

briefdescription.para: The address type indicates whether an address is public or random.

Random address.
